== History ==
Softonic started in 1997 as a file-oriented service called Shareware Intercom,<ref>[http://shareware.intercom.es/upload_eng.htm "Shareware"]. Intercom.es.</ref> at Intercom Online (Grupo Intercom), a provider of Internet services in Cerdanyola del VallÃ©s, near Barcelona. Originally files for the website came from the "Files Library Intercom BBS" at Intercom Online, using a "5-step semi-automated process", which was later greatly simplified.<ref>{{cite web |title=Backstage |publisher=Shareware.Intercom.es |url=http://www.shareware.intercom.es/backstage.htm |archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/19990221082904/http://www.shareware.intercom.es/backstage.htm |archivedate=February 21, 1999 |language=Spanish}} ([http://translate.google.com/translate?u=http%3A//web.archive.org/web/19990221082904/http%3A//www.shareware.intercom.es/backstage.htm&hl=en&langpair=auto|en&tbb=1&ie=UTF-8 English tr.]).</ref> The company also offered monthly CDs of its software library for users tired of "having to wait for downloads to complete or pay exorbitant phone bills."<ref>{{cite web|title=CDROMs Softonic |publisher=Softonic.com |url=http://www.softonic.com/cdrom.phtml |archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/200012050751/http://www.softonic.com/cdrom.phtml |archivedate=December 5, 2000}}</ref> In 1999, the service was described as having a "generosity of games, antivirus, education and the long, seductive etcetera."<ref>{{cite web |title =Enredados (Tangled) |url=http://www.eltiempo.com/archivo/documento/MAM-949160 |date= December 19, 1999 |author= |publisher=[[El Tiempo]]| location=Spain |language=Spanish}}([http://translate.google.com/translate?u=http%3A//www.eltiempo.com/archivo/documento/MAM-949160&hl=en&langpair=auto|en&tbb=1&ie=UTF-8 English tr.])</ref> Due to the popularity of the service among its users, in 2000 the company became independent under the name Softonic.<ref>[http://en.softonic.com/about "About Softonic"]. Softonic.com. Retrieved October 12, 2011.</ref> In 2004, Softonic was made available in German, and in 2005, English.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://web.archive.org/web/20051215051850/http://en.softonic.com/about/ |archiveurl=http://en.softonic.com/about/ |title=About Softonic |publisher=Softonic.com |archivedate= December 15, 2005}}</ref> Initially the service was oriented only to downloads of [[DOS]] and [[Windows (operating system)|Windows]] software,<ref>{{cite web|title=Shareware.intercom |publisher=shareware.intercom.es| url=http://web.archive.org/web/19971224064811/http://shareware.intercom.es/ |archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/19971224064811/http://shareware.intercom.es/ |archivedate=December 24, 1997|language=Spanish}}</ref> but evolved to offer software downloads for [[Macintosh (computer)|Mac]] and mobile platforms. Softonic was listed as the best place to work (100-250 employees) in an annual study by the Great Place to Work Institute, in 2009-2011, and #2 in 2008.<ref>{{cite web|title= Best Workplaces in Spain 2011 |url=http://www.greatplacetowork.net/index.php?option=com_content&view=category&layout=blog&id=27&Itemid=208 |publisher=Great Place to Work |accessdate=October 13,2011}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |title=Vodafone, Louis Vuitton y Softonic, entre las mejores empresas para trabajar en EspaÃ±a |date=April 22, 2010| work=El Mundo |url=http://www.elmundo.es/mundodinero/2010/04/22/economia/1271944478.html|language=Spanish}}<!-- 2010--></ref>
== Downloads ==
Softonic offers the "Softonic Toolbar", a Windows-only 4MB web browser add-on for [[Firefox]] and [[Internet Explorer]] which provides company-specific "content on the fly, many interesting online services, and can be easily customized" and "streamed music" using the "built-in music player".<ref>[http://softonic-toolbar.en.softonic.com/ "Softonic Toolbar"]. Softonic.com. March 24, 2010.</ref>
Downloads hosted at Softonic can be preceded by a customized installer called "Softonic Downloader" which shows "commercial offers, such as the Softonic Toolbar."<ref name="SDL">[http://softonic-toolbar.en.softonic.com/download "Softonic Toolbar" download page].</ref> Downloads not hosted by Softonic are not accompanied by the Softonic Downloader.
